recipe.title: Grilled Corn with Lime-Cilantro Butter
instructions: 1. Combine the butter, lime juice, lime zest, sugar, salt, and cilantro in a medium bowl and mix well.
2. Grill the corn on a medium-hot grill for 10 minutes, turning occasionally.
3. Transfer the lime-cilantro butter to a serving bowl and serve with the corn.
